name: Dark Machoke

attacks.name: Drag Off
attacks.text: Before doing damage, choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and switch it with the Defending Pokémon. Do the damage to the new Defending Pokémon. This attack can't be used if your opponent has no Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Knock Back
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokémon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokémon.)

flavorText: While normally peaceful and friendly, the number of incidents involving cruel Machokes is rising.

strengths: Drag Off lets you choose which Pokemon to attack
Knock Back forces switching after damage
weaknesses: Both attacks require opponent to have bench

competitiveHistory: Dark Machoke had interesting switching mechanics. Drag Off was like a built-in Gust of Wind effect, letting you target weak benched Pokemon. This made it useful for picking off damaged or vulnerable Pokemon hiding on the bench.

rulings.ruling: Drag Off switches before damage, so you deal damage to the new Active Pokemon.
Knock Back switches after damage, so you damage the original Defending Pokemon.
